description:
Persons in employment (rate of change on previous year's
quarter)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
13321 Employment accounts

Definition:
Percentage change on previous year's quarter, e.g.
((1st quarter 2009 : 1st quarter 2008)*100)-100
